channel.title: Pastebin / Code snippets section?
channel.description:
We could have actual tutorials in the tutorial section, and code snippets, autospawns, errors, and other text files in the pastebin section. I think it's a good idea because it keeps the quality level in the tutorial section by giving another place to put those types of posts. It could be something like a less formal section, and a useful place to post all of these chat logs from the IRC, errors, and cool stuff that doesn't merit having its own tutorial.
I got the original idea from Stanyer after it was posted in the tutorials section. Also, there's really no place for non-vets to post their suggestions. Perhaps we should have a General Discussion section for moparscape?

item.title: Pastebin / Code snippets section?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

That’s what I suggested a while back, a board to post things like that, but no one really supported it or took the time to view is =S

Read full topic

item.title: Pastebin / Code snippets section?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

yar, or just make a paste bin type thing, like sppts paste bin.
Because that lays out like posts, so people can browse through that.
When i first set up javacisnotrecognized.com, sppt offered me his paste bin, and im pretty sure if mopar doesn’t have it sppt would let mopar use and adapt it
http://www.javacisnotrecognized.com/pastebin/index.php?pv=all.

That would do good for things like autospawns if mopar set one up IE: pb.moparisthebest.com or moparisthebest.com/pastebin

Read full topic
